arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَبِاللَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَخَيْرُ الْأَسْمَاءِ لِلَّهِ
اَشْهَدُ اَنْ لَا اِلٰهَ اِلَّا اللَّهُ
اَرْسَلَهُ بِالْحَقِّ بَشِيْرًا وَنَذِيْرًا بَيْنَ يَدَيَّ السَّاعَةِ
اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
وَتَقَبَّلْ شَفَاعَتَهُ فِيْ اُمَّتِهِ وَارْفَعْ دَرَجَتَهُ
translation: In the name of Allah, by Allah, all Praise is for Allah, and the best names are for Allah
I bear witness that there is no god but Allah
there is no partner for Him
and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and His Messenger
He sent him with the Truth as a bearer of good news and a warner, before the coming of the hour
and I bear witness that You are the best Lord
and that Muhammad is the best Messenger
O Allah bless Muhammad and his family
and accept his intercession for his Ummah and raise his status
transliteration: bismillāhi wabillāhi walḥamdu lillāhi wakhayrul asmā-i lillāh
ar-salahu bil ḥaqqi bashīran wanadhīran bayna yadayyas sā`ah
allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
wataqabbal shafā`atahu fī ummatihi war-fa` darajatah
